AboutPage.aboutText: I'm a Frontend Developer specializing in React & TypeScript, building high-quality, API-driven web applications with Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Redux. I bridge the user interface to core functionality, delivering functional and performant solutions. Passionate about technology and continuous learning, I turn ideas into polished products while tackling new challenges.

Services.title: Services
Services.WebDevelopmentDesc: Building responsive, scalable, and maintainable web applications.
Services.UIUXImplementationDesc: Transforming designs into pixel-perfect, accessible, and interactive interfaces.
Services.APIIntegrationDesc: Connecting frontends with REST & GraphQL APIs to deliver dynamic experiences.
Services.PerformanceOptimizationDesc: Optimizing apps for speed, SEO, and best user experience across devices.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.VSCodeCloneDesc: A Visual Studio Code clone (preview only) built with React, TypeScript, and Redux Toolkit. Simulates file explorer, tab management, and layout with recursion, Redux state management, and data persistence.
Projects.ProductBuilderDesc: Quick, lightweight tool for building and customizing products, with live previews, responsive layout, and intuitive configuration options.
Projects.AICVAnalyzerDesc: AI-powered CV evaluation platform that analyzes resumes and provides instant insights, highlighting strengths and improvement areas.
Projects.HeadphoneLandingpageDesc: Modern landing page for premium headphones, showcasing features with a clean, responsive design.
Projects.ECommerceReactDesc: Simple e-commerce website built with React to browse products and manage a shopping cart.
Projects.FullstackTodolistDesc: Fullstack todo app with authentication and database support for managing daily tasks.
Projects.FullstackEcommerceDesc: A modern, full-stack e-commerce application featuring a fast, interactive UI built with Next.js, and efficient database management using Prisma with MongoDB.
